name: Stonk Clicker
description:
Stonk clicker is a game I created during the recent stock market craze of early 2021. The game was made in the hope to raise awareness of the long-term and short term capital gain tax in the U.S. The game is fairly simple to play, and the only control you need is a mouse and the space bar. For more information about how to play or the tax bracket, you can access it in the in-game menu. I hope you enjoy the game :)

PS: Recommend playing this game on Firefox or another browser besides google chrome.
